title: Why You Shouldn't Pay for Anything With Zelle

title: Please Don't Put Cooking Spray in Your Air Fryer
description: One of things everyone loves about their air fryer is how it can make foods crispy without using a ton of oil. This does not, however, prevent people from adding some oil to their food. After all, fat is flavor, and there can be some anxiety over things sticking to the basket tray.
